short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hometalk Pin Extension is a tool for members of Hometalk's Pinterest Influencer Program.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hometalk Pin Extension is an alternative way to pin content on Pinterest, exclusive to members of Hometalk's Pinterest Influencer Program. If you are interested in learning more about the program, please contact Aimee at aimee@hometalk.com.
